channel.title: Japanese localization for Auxy
channel.description:
I had seen a review that wants Auxy to adapt to Japanese language in App Store before. Then, I Thought I (we) might be able to help Japanese localization to have Japanese people who can’t understand English at all but want to make music with this great app use Auxy.
So, I want you to vote agree or not and reply to express your opinion.
[poll type=regular] * Agree (to Japanese localization) * Disagree (to do that) [/poll]

item.title: Japanese localization for Auxy
item.dc:creator: SusumuTouhoku
item.description:
And BTC. This is a big attraction of this app. It can’t be missed so we wanna translate as possible.
But it held frequently. And translater may be busy sometime (unless member isn’t a NEET). So translating the BTC is hard, I think (if not, I apologize).
Well… Can we separate the BTC by country?
Advantage of this is… we don’t need to translate.
BTC team in each country select a best number of week, month and year. The best number of year in each country gather on the end of year, and developer decide the best number of year in the world. spoiler
Disadvantage is… make challenge continuously is hard so who make challenge? spoiler
Let me hear your opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Japanese localization for Auxy
item.dc:creator: SusumuTouhoku
item.description:
App Store page…
I think, translating original sentences is a little bit hard and take some time. (Actually, I’m not good at English as you know…)
So, developer sends some itemized updated/fixed things and we translate and make articles for App Store page.
This is a good template for translating…
If things are itemized, we’ll make sense easier and faster.
Then other members proof the article, and out for App Store.
… It might have some problems? Let me know

Read full topic

Although I’m little bit too busy to summarize that kind of article or video at the moment, I would love to contribute to make tutorials.
It would be nice with recorded screen clips, which should be available in next iPhone update.

item.title: Japanese localization for Auxy
item.dc:creator: LittleSpikes
item.description:
Plus, since BTC held weekly in this forum, there will be some weekends when we can’t spare times to translate rules and follow up Q&As. In this situation, Japanese new comers might think “Auxy team is unfair and irresponsible”, and I really don’t want them to think so.
Personally, maybe I can help them, but I’m afraid of doing it as a “Japanese official”.

Read full topic

item.title: Japanese localization for Auxy
item.dc:creator: LittleSpikes
item.description:
Hi, LilSpikes here.
As a Japanese speaker, I might be able to help out other Japanese, and I would love to.
However, I’m not sure about the idea “Japanese localization”

In my opinion, Auxy is simple enough to make music in spite of language barriers.
I know some Japanese have difficulty in English, but not all. I also know some Japanese Auxy user, like you, Kayasho, Tsunan’z, Susumu, Midori (they are all fantastic ), and you will find some more in twitter. I guess the number of Japanese users is not too small. (If it IS small,) This number is just a consequence of small population of people being interested in music making. I guess.

So I’m not sure about Necessity of Japanese localization, which tend to ruin the original simplicity with awkward translation.

Read full topic
